Translations.Text: Allah Taalaa jo zabardast hai aur hikmat wala hai issi tarah teri taraf aur tujh say aglon ki taraf wahee bhejta raha
Aasmano ki (tamam) cheezen aur jo kuch zamin mein hai sab ussi ka hai woh bartar aur azeem-us-shan hai

Qareeb hai aasman uper say phat paren aur tamam farishtay apnay rab ki paki tareef kay sath biyan ker rahey hain aur zamin walon kay liye istaghfar ker rahey hain. Khoob samajh rakho kay Allah Taalaa hi maaf farmaney wala rehmat wala hai
Jinn logon ney uss kay siwa doosron ko kaar saaz bana liya hai Allah Taalaa unn per nigran hai aur aap unkay zimaydaar nahi hain

Issi tarah hum ney aap ki taraf arabi quran ki wahee ki hai takay aap makkah walon ko aur uss kay aas pass logon ko khabardar ker den aur jama honey kay din say jiss kay aanay mein koi shak nahi dara den. Aik giroh jannat mein hoga aur aik giroh jahannum mein hoga
Agar Allah Taalaa chahata to inn sab ko aik hi ummat ka bana deta lekin woh jissay chahata hai apni rehmat mein dakhil ker leta hai aur zalimon ka haami aur madadgar koi nahi
Kiya inn logon ney Allah kay siwa aur kaar saaz bana liye hain (haqeeqatan) to Allah Taalaa hi kaar saaz hai wohi murdon ko zindah keray ga aur wohi her cheez per qadir hai
